mng: to check, to examine, to inspect, to exercise restraint

exm.mng: to retrieve (data), to look up, retrieval, search
to detect, to test, detection, sensing
to inspect, to review (troops etc), military review
to examine or inspect, self-criticism, review
public security authorities, acronym from 公安局[gong1 an1 ju2], 檢察院|检察院[jian3 cha2 yuan4] and 法院[fa3 yuan4]
a test, determination, to check up on, to examine, to assay
